alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:39PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Johns, northwestern Putnam and central Clay Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 739 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Green Cove Springs, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs, Fruit Cove, Fleming Island, George`s Lake, Picolata, Switzerland, Penney Farms and Asbury Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Putnam
